title: Wilson's Tales of the Borders and of Scotland, Volume 14
author: Various
snippet: Oh! what fun and frolic we have hadtogether! The Castle Wood, Barmuir Wood, Gilchrist Land Wood, thePothouse Wood, the Whitston Cleughs, and the Gravel Walk, could tell, ifthey were permitted, many tales of us three.
